title: For Sale/Trade:  LC9 w/CRIMSON TRACE® LASERGUARD®
postcontent:
I got this LC9 w/CRIMSON TRACE®LASERGUARD® for the wife for her birthday 
(NEW 10-13-13 ) ( and comes with everything )
and after shooting it she did not like the trigger on it so I did some upgrades as are listed below.
Well after all that she still doesn't like it so it's up for sale or trade. With all the work done on it this is a steal at $550.00   FTF ONLY “ Valid state ID required and CHL preferred ”





LC9 w/CRIMSON TRACE® LASERGUARD®

•DAO, semi-auto, hammer-forged, lock-breech pistol w/smooth trigger pull •Features smooth "melted" edges for ease of holstering, carrying & drawing •Through-hardened alloy steel slide •Alloy steel barrel •Black, high performance, glass-filled nylon grip frame •Single-sided manual safety & magazine disconnect •Highly-visible, adjustable 3-Dot sights (single-dot dovetailed front sight & low-profile two-dot rear sight) •Width: 0.90" •Ht.: 4.50" OAL: 6.0" •1:10 RH twist •Wt. 17.10 oz.

9mm 7+1    3.12"    Blued 

GALLOWAY PRECISION
35% Shorter Stroke Trigger Bar for Ruger LC9
SN 320-321 Trigger Bar and required Reduced Power Firing Pin Return Spring

The much awaited LC9 and LC380, NOT LCP, trigger bar is here, no more machining your hammer and bar we do it all now with our custom trigger bar. This new drop in bar is the design the gun magazines, CCW school instructors and customers have asked for in addition to our wildly popular 50% short stroke trigger system upgrade to CUSTOMER SUPPLIED STOCK PARTS. This bar is ready to drop in no fitting required, we have eliminated the possibility of reset or disconnect issues that sometimes came with the old conversion when factory component tolerances stacked up on the high side. 
-This bar WILL WORK WITH THE SHORT STROKE II trigger from RTK making for the most impressive setup out there.
-This bar is not compatible with the RTK Slim trigger. 
-The 35% bar allows the use of a reduced power hammer spring, add it to your trigger bar order below, includes the lighter firing pin return spring.
-Drop in design, made of high alloy tool steel and heat treated for long life and rigid quality control from step one on.
-Custom made to our specs this will shorten your pull and reset by 35%, add a Short Stroke II for even more reduction.
-It does not lighten the pull but shortens it, making staying on target easy and follow up shots faster. No factory safeties are affected.
-After the early break it will stop about 10mm from the back and break about 14mm from the back, it will still reset only at the front like normal though. 

Reduced Power Spring Kit for Ruger LC9
These are the reduced power springs that have been asked for to help eliminate the stacking at the end of your LC9  trigger pull by reducing the spring power of the firing pin blocker spring and the lifter arm spring.

Reduced Power Hammer Spring for Ruger LC9
This spring will pull about 1.5 pounds out of your trigger pull weight and provide full ignition on standard primers.

title: For Sale:  Heckler & Koch USP Compact 9x19
location: Windsor Bear Arms, Fort Collins, Colorado
postcontent:
USP COMPACT 9x19 with 4 factory 13 round H&K Mags.

The HK USP Compact is a small frame pistol capable of firing the most powerful cartridges in 9 mm, .40 S&W, .45 ACP, and .357 SIG (by special order). Based on the full-size USP models, these handy pistols combine compact size with optimum effective shooting performance.

USP Compacts are smaller and lighter than large frame USPs. The reduction in trigger reach and grip circumference increases concealability and enhances shooting ergonomics. Unlike some subcompact semiautomatic pistols that use a difficult to shoot "two-finger grip" frame, the USP Compact uses a narrow, full-hand grip frame with a choice of interchangeable extended or flush-fitting magazine floorplates. This makes the pistol easy to shoot without sacrificing concealability.

Like their large frame predecessors, USP Compacts are designed with the demanding needs of the law enforcement and military shooters in mind. Using a modified linkless Browning-type action, the USP Compact is built to take the punishment of high-energy +P loads.

To reduce the length of the slide and barrel on the USP Compact, the mechanical recoil reduction system found on large frame USPs has been replaced by a specially designed flat compression spring contained in the captive recoil spring assembly by a polymer absorber bushing. Service life is still engineered to exceed 20,000 rounds.

Easy to shoot, simple to maintain; the USP Compact is a reliable, safe, accurate, and highly concealable pistol.

Features & System Characteristics:
Corrosion proof fiber-reinforced polymer frame
Grooved target triggers
Polygonal bore profile for increased velocity, easier cleaning, and longer barrel life
Can be converted to any of nine trigger firing modes

Choice of corrosion resistant “Hostile Environment” blued finish or stainless steel slide
One piece machined slide made from nitro-carburized steel
No snag, bobbed hammer
Flared recurve trigger guard
Choice of flat and extended floorplate magazines
Universal mounting grooves for installing accessories

SAFETY

Like all of models in our XD® line, the XD-S™ has all of the safety features to ensure your safety and the safety of those around you while handling the pistol.

Ultra Safety Assurance (USA)
Trigger System™
The USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge, from dropping or bumping it, by locking the trigger in place until direct rearward pressure is applied.

Loaded Chamber Indicator
The Loaded Chamber Indicator allows the shooter to verify without a doubt, visually or by touch, that there is a round in the chamber.

Grip Safety
All XD®, XD(M)® and XD-S™ models allows firing only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

Fail-Safe Disassembly
The XD-S™ disassembles just like the XD®, however, with the XD-S™, the disassembly lever cannot be manipulated with a magazine in the pistol. Additionally, when the disassembly lever is up, a magazine cannot be inserted into the pistol.

Secure Grip Texture
The “all-terrain” look of the XD(M)® has proven to work so well that the texture has been enhanced for the XD-S™ with an even more pronounced texture to ensure your grip is always secure.

Melonite® Finish and Carrying Case
To preserve the safety and quality of your pistol, we’ve added a Melonite® finish on all XD® models for a deep penetrating finish that protects against corrosion. Also, our rugged case is as durable as the XD-S™ trademark it carries.

title: For Sale:  Romanian PSL project gun + EXTRAS!
postcontent:
I have for sale a Romanian PSL. All matching serial numbers and rifle has the bolt lock. Project objective was to build a paratrooper model. But, life gets in the way. 

Barrel has been cut and re-crowned at 19 1/2 inches. 
Kit includes original stock set, Troup Systems Tiger Maple stock system, a black polymer railed hand guard, A Harris style bi-pod, 5 magazines, original mag case, cleaning kit and rod, oil can, leather sling, and PSOP case. 

Also including 2 scopes. An original to rifle PSOP with EXTREMELY clear glass. And A Barska 6-24x50 AO Varmint scope on a railed high mount and its included bikini lens cover. 

NOW, the disclaimer. 
This is a project gun. It needs a bit of work suck as refinishing and gas port re jetting. Also, in order to fit the Troup Systems hand guard, the retainer ring on the gas tube needs to be removed. 

Other than all that, it functions just fine with brass cased light ball. Has not fired corrosive ammo and the bore is very bright and shiny. No rust what so ever inside the receiver or on the bore.

Gas Operation System with Exhaust Valve. The unique gas operation system, patented by Beretta, with self-cleaning gas cylinder and piston, is provided with a self cleaning exhaust valve that automatically vents the excess gases of the most powerful cartridges.The result is that the shotgun, without any adjustment, fires everything from the weakest 28g (1 ounce, 3 ¾ dram equivalent) game load to the heaviest 64g (2 ¼ ounce) Super Magnum cartridge. The exhaust valve remains attached to the barrel, ensuring easy and quick assembly and disassembly of the shotgun. Using accelerated salt-spray testing, the unprotected steel barrel section (top) shows corrosive effects, whereas the Aqua Technology–protected barrel (bottom) looks brand new. In fact, the Xtrema2 is the only gun to have passed a 150-hour salt-spray test with no signs of corrosion. Also, all steel par ts are now manufactured from stainless steel or are plated with either: nickel, Bruniton, PVD, Aqua Film (receiver & barrel) or chrome (barrel, bore and bolt), making the Xtrema2 a match for even the most extreme environments

title: For Trade:  Military Suburban
postcontent:
This is a 1997 3/4 ton four wheel drive Chevrolet Military Suburban 1500 with Automatic Transmission. It originated from the United States Army and still has the Metal Government ID Plate attached. I just had Russ Moore put a new 4L80e transmission and new U joints in it a few months ago. It also has a total tune up, 2 new batteries, new shocks all the way around, new belts and hoses, new water pump, new turn signal switch and relays, new computer, new wiring harness, and more. It runs and drives great. It has power seats, power steering, power door locks, power windows,a digital compass built into the rear view mirror. Original Factory Flat Camo paint. Factory Tinted Windows. It still has all the military hardware in it, spot light. 2 m16 gun racks , shovel, whip antennas, prc radio, 2 cb's, a pa system and more. It was used as a military police vehicle, and still has the wooden billy club and MP arm patch, in it. The truck has 165,000 miles, the previous owner which was a military academy rebuilt the motor. It was a Florida truck so there's no rust and the body is in excellent condition. It has the gas 5.7 Liter 350 Vortec motor.


It runs and drives good. The 4 wheel drive works good and I've used both high and low and the transmission is brand new and has a 3 year 100,000 mile warranty through Russ Moore.The tires are the Maxxis Mudder Buckshot LT245/75R16 120/116 N. It has a 42 Gallon Gas Tank. It gets about 15 miles per Gallon. Reese Hitch, Ball Hitch, Front and Rear Shackles, Original Brush Guard with the NATO Slave Switch, Laptop Stand with plugin and much, much more. This Suburban was made to MilSpec at the GM Military Plant. It is set up with all you need to tow/haul/carry. Additional info/Pics on request.

title: For Sale:  SMITH & WESSON 9mm
postcontent:
the Smith & Wesson SW9VE (also known as the Enhanced Sigma). The SW9VE is a 9mm semi-automatic pistol with a black polymer frame and stainless steel barrel and slide. 
First of all, the SW9VE pistol is very simple. It has only three external controls. One button drops the clip from the pistols grip. Once you've loaded the clip, depressing a lever along the slide, closes the pistol's breech and loads a round into the firing chamber. At this point, the pistol is ready to fire. There is no manual safety. A safety built into the trigger ensures that the pistol fires only when the trigger is pulled. In addition, the trigger has a long and fairly heavy pull to ensure that a round is fired only intentionally. Bullets are fired when an internal striker hits the round. There is no hammer to cock or to inadvertently snag on clothing. 
Also, the pistol is reliable, accurate & easy to handle.
